mapper.select: select * from (select a.id as id, b.article_id, a.word_name as wordName, a.pin_yin as pinYin, a.acceptation,a.short_acce as shortAcce from word_chinese a join word_article_word_rel b on a.id = b.word_id and exists(select 1 from word_user_rel c where c.word_id = b.word_id) ) data ${ew.customSqlSegment}
